name: OMNI AVIATION
about: OMNI Aviation Corporation, located in Clark, Philippines, is a premier flight training facility in Asia, offering top-notch programs in pilot training, cabin crew training, airline services training, and aircraft maintenance training. Founded by Captain Ben Hur Gomez, OMNI is the sole International Air Transport Association (IATA) Authorized Training Center in the Philippines, ensuring training meets the highest international standards. With a fleet of 22 aircraft, including Cessna 152, Cessna 172, and Piper Seneca 34-200, OMNI is managed by professional pilots, educators, and industrialists. The school has a 30-year history of excellence, providing internationally competent individuals to the aviation and travel industries, and is certified by the Civil Aviation Authority of the Philippines (CAAP). OMNI Aviation is dedicated to developing general aviation in the Philippines and maintains a strong commitment to safety and quality training.
services:
["Private Pilot License
Commercial Pilot License
Flight Instructor (CFI / FI)
Instrument Rating (IR)"]
